``` index=ponycashauth ```
``` | stats dc(clientid) as Users ```
| eval Users=Users*2.2
| table Users"},"name":"magiclink"},"ds_OV4UpYhA":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"`conf22_buttercup_bucks_contract` sourcetype="ethereum:transaction:event" 
| spath event
| eval tokenID=json_extract(event,"args.tokenID")
| fillnull value=0 tokenID
| eval Component = if(tokenID=0,"BCB","NFTs")
| timechart partial=false span=120m count by Component"},"name":"xdai"},"ds_25arnPpv":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=federated:xdai sourcetype="ethereum:transaction:event" 
| timechart partial=false count as Gnosis"},"name":"xdai_transactions"},"ds_FCl236jF":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| makeresults count = 1
